name: Youth Centers of Israel / קרן ילדנו מרכזי תקוותנו
overview:
Closing Gaps - Opening Horizons. Non Profit Organization 501©3 EIN 51-0163781 The North American Chapter of Keren Yaldenu, Israel. Mission: Our mission is to Close Gaps and Open Horizons in Israeli society by giving opportunities of advancement for those youngsters who don’t have it, often due to the economic hardship in their families. The idea of closing the social gap in Israel is a national priority and is the key goal for the YCOI. Company Overview: Youth Centers of Israel is a charitable organization dedicated to promoting education and life advancement for many disadvantaged children and youth in Israel. YCOI works close with its parent organization Keren Yaldenu Tikvatenu to sustain and develop numerous educational youth centers and after-school programs across Israel.

We are a worldwide organization with affiliates in the US, UK, Switzerland, Italy, Netherlands, France and, of course, Israel.
